Title: Study the "Selected Works of Mao Zedong" Volume V well, follow Chairman Hua and advance victoriously
Designer: Li Liuhai (李留海)Fan Shuning (范澍宁)
Publisher: Xinjiang renmin chubanshe (新疆人民出版社)
Notes: Published in Xinjiang, title also in Uyghur.In the background a crowd is marching with a banner against the Gang of Four and one promoting the study of Daqing and Dazhai.
Theme: Selected Works of Mao Zedong Volume VHua Guofeng
